title: Foreign Language Economic Concept Learning Design Utilizing Humor

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Economic Terminology and Fundamental Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: For current professionals who need to acquire advanced economic concepts applicable to real-world practice in a foreign language. Requires flexible design considering metacognition and differences in learning styles.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain three core economic concepts with over 80% accuracy through humor videos produced in English.
Learners will be able to write a case study report applying economic terminology acquired from video content to real-world work scenarios.
Learners will be able to analyze their own cognitive processing methods observed during video learning and propose improvement strategies through self-assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
